EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-05-12-Indy 500 Raffle Last Chance Send.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance - Can I Send You to the Indy 500?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CKCKTV8?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=%5bmarketo_zs00ja7e8g_value%5d&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=%5bmarketo_ff0s7l5qls_value%5d&marketo_olh86f3r9s=%5bmarketo_olh86f3r9s_value%5d&marketo_day0sfb59s=%5bmarketo_day0sfb59s_value%5d&marketo_qqebotxyuo=%5bmark> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, This is the last chance to guarantee your tickets to the Greatest Spectacle in Racing. We want to send you and a friend to the 101st Running of the Indy 500 on May 28th <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CKCKTV8?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=%5bmarketo_zs00ja7e8g_value%5d&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=%5bmarketo_ff0s7l5qls_value%5d&marketo_olh86f3r9s=%5bmarketo_olh86f3r9s_value%5d&marketo_day0sfb59s=%5bmarketo_day0sfb59s_value%5d&marketo_qqebotxyuo=%5bmark]]>! Turbonomic is giving away pairs of (2) Reserved Seating tickets to people who schedule a 30-minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer. The giveaway ends on Monday, May 15th, and the tickets are going fast. This is the last opportunity so make sure you schedule your meeting today <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CKCKTV8?marketo_zs00ja7e8g=%5bmarketo_zs00ja7e8g_value%5d&marketo_ff0s7l5qls=%5bmarketo_ff0s7l5qls_value%5d&marketo_olh86f3r9s=%5bmarketo_olh86f3r9s_value%5d&marketo_day0sfb59s=%5bmarketo_day0sfb59s_value%5d&marketo_qqebotxyuo=%5bmark]]>! Best, Adam
